item.title: OSI Model Layer
item.description: About OSI Model OSI stands for Open System Interconnection Model enables syetems to communicate using standard protocols. It is based on 7 layers . During my college days, I used to remeber it as “PDN-T-SPA” which is Physical , Data , Network , Transport , Session , Presentation and Application layer. Comparing OSI Model Layer with TCP/IP model
